actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the small issuer exception from the tax-exempt bond arbitrage rebate requirement.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise provisions concerning the small ($5 million or less) issuer exception from the tax exempt bond arbitrage rebate requirement.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the small issuer exception from the tax-exempt bond arbitrage rebate requirement.
